FilmyData.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
FilmyData.writers: James Cameron, Rick Jaffa, Amanda Silver, Shane Salerno, Josh Friedman
FilmyData.cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Kate Winslet, Cliff Curtis
FilmyData.plot: Set more than a decade after the events of the first film, learn the story of the Sully family (Jake, Neytiri, and their kids), the trouble that follows them, the lengths they go to keep each other safe, the battles they fight to stay alive, and the tragedies they endure.

FilmyData.title: How to Train Your Dragon
FilmyData.writers: Chris Sanders, Dean DeBlois, Cressida Cowell, William Davies
FilmyData.cast: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera, Jonah Hill, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
FilmyData.plot: As the son of a Viking leader on the cusp of manhood, shy Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III faces a rite of passage: he must kill a dragon to prove his warrior mettle. But after downing a feared dragon, he realizes that he no longer wants to destroy it, and instead befriends the beast – which he names Toothless – much to the chagrin of his warrior father.

FilmyData.title: Despicable Me
FilmyData.writers: Sergio Pablos
FilmyData.cast: Steve Carell, Miranda Cosgrove, Dana Gaier, Elsie Fisher, Jason Segel, Russell Brand
FilmyData.plot: Villainous Gru lives up to his reputation as a despicable, deplorable and downright unlikable guy when he hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land in his care.

FilmyData.title: Johnny English
FilmyData.writers: Neal Purvis, William Davies, Robert Wade
FilmyData.cast: Rowan Atkinson, Natalie Imbruglia, Ben Miller, John Malkovich, Greg Wise
FilmyData.plot: A lowly pencil pusher working for MI7, Johnny English is suddenly promoted to super spy after Agent One is assassinated and every other agent is blown up at his funeral. When a billionaire entrepreneur sponsors the exhibition of the Crown Jewels—and the valuable gems disappear on the opening night and on English's watch, the newly-designated agent must jump into action to find the thief and recover the missing gems.

FilmyData.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
FilmyData.writers: Gore Verbinski, Ted Elliott, Terry Rossio
FilmyData.cast: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport, Jonathan Pryce, Lee Arenberg, Mackenzie Crook
FilmyData.plot: Jack Sparrow, a freewheeling 18th-century pirate, quarrels with a rival pirate bent on pillaging Port Royal. When the governor's daughter is kidnapped, Sparrow decides to help the girl's love save her.

FilmyData.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
FilmyData.writers: George Lucas
FilmyData.cast: Hayden Christensen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Ian McDiarmid, Samuel L. Jackson, Jimmy Smits, Frank Oz
FilmyData.plot: The evil Darth Sidious enacts his final plan for unlimited power—and the heroic Jedi Anakin Skywalker must choose a side.

FilmyData.title: Transformers
FilmyData.writers: Alex Kurtzman, Roberto Orci, John Rogers
FilmyData.cast: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson, Rachael Taylor, John Turturro, Peter Cullen
FilmyData.plot: Young teenager Sam Witwicky becomes involved in the ancient struggle between two extraterrestrial factions of transforming robots—the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons. Sam holds the clue to unimaginable power and the Decepticons will stop at nothing to retrieve it.

FilmyData.title: Iron Man
FilmyData.writers: Mark Fergus, Hawk Ostby, Art Marcum, Matt Holloway
FilmyData.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
FilmyData.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight against evil forces and becomes the superhero Iron Man.

FilmyData.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
FilmyData.writers: George Lucas
FilmyData.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
FilmyData.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

FilmyData.title: Toy Story
FilmyData.writers: John Lasseter, Pete Docter, Andrew Stanton, Joe Ranft, Joss Whedon
FilmyData.cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
FilmyData.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

FilmyData.title: The Avengers
FilmyData.writers: Joss Whedon, Zak Penn
FilmyData.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
FilmyData.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

FilmyData.title: Indiana Jones: Raiders of the Lost Ark
FilmyData.writers: Lawrence Kasdan
FilmyData.cast: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
FilmyData.plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

FilmyData.title: Finding Nemo
FilmyData.writers: Andrew Stanton, Bob Peterson, David Reynolds
FilmyData.cast: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould
FilmyData.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

FilmyData.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
FilmyData.writers: Jonathan Goldstein, John Francis Daley, Jon Watts, Christopher Ford, Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers
FilmyData.cast: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei
FilmyData.plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

FilmyData.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
FilmyData.writers: Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas
FilmyData.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
FilmyData.plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker struggles to bring Darth Vader back to the light side of the Force.

FilmyData.title: Frozen
FilmyData.writers: Jennifer Lee, Chris Buck, Shane Morris
FilmyData.cast: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff, Josh Gad
FilmyData.plot: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

FilmyData.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
FilmyData.writers: James Gunn, Nicole Perlman
FilmyData.cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper
FilmyData.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals is forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

FilmyData.title: Avengers: Infinity War
FilmyData.writers: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely
FilmyData.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson
FilmyData.plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

FilmyData.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
FilmyData.writers: Leigh Brackett, Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas
FilmyData.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
FilmyData.plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

FilmyData.title: Thor: Ragnarok
FilmyData.writers: Eric Pearson, Craig Kyle, Christopher L. Yost
FilmyData.cast: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett, Mark Ruffalo
FilmyData.plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

FilmyData.title: Avengers: Endgame
FilmyData.writers: Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely
FilmyData.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson
FilmyData.plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
